Title: First Cow
Synopsis: In the 1820s Northwest, two travelers learn their plan of striking it rich will rely on the use of a landowner's prized dairy cow.

Title: Boys State
Synopsis: A thousand teenage boys attending Boys State in Texas decide to build their own state government.

Title: On the Rocks
Synopsis: A father and daughter harbor suspicions about her husband's fidelity.

Title: Saint Maud
Synopsis: Hospice nurse Maud, a recent convert to Roman Catholicism, becomes obsessed with saving the soul of one of her patients.

Title: Minari
Synopsis: A family of South Korean immigrants tries to make it in the U.S. during the 1980s.

Title: False Positive
Synopsis: A woman begins to suspect there is something sinister about her pregnancy.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Hulu

Title: Zola
Synopsis: Zola is a part-time stripper who is convinced by her new friend to travel to Tampa, Florida, to earn money.

Title: Val
Synopsis: A documentary which follows the life and career of American actor Val Kilmer.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Amazon Studios

Title: The Green Knight
Synopsis: Gawain, a nephew of King Arthur, sets out on a journey to test his courage and face the Green Knight.

Title: Lamb
Synopsis: A childless couple in rural Iceland finds themselves parenting an endearing but unsettlingly humanoid lamb.

Title: The Souvenir Part II
Synopsis: A film student deals with the aftermath of her relationship to an older man.

Title: C'mon C'mon
Synopsis: A radio journalist and his young nephew forge an unexpected bond over a cross-country trip.

Title: The Humans
Synopsis: In Lower Manhattan, the Blake family gathers for a Thanksgiving dinner.
Notes: Also produced by A24; co-distributed with Showtime

Title: Red Rocket
Synopsis: A washed-up porn star returns to his small Texas hometown, even though no one there really wants him back.

Title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
Synopsis: After a supernatural prophecy, Macbeth sets out to become the King of Scotland.
Notes: Also produced by A24; co-distributed with Apple TV+

Title: The Sky Is Everywhere
Synopsis: A young musician tries to keep things together after the death of her older sister.

Title: After Yang
Synopsis: A family attempts to save the life of their robotic family member, Yang, who has become unresponsive.
Notes: Also produced by A24; co-distributed with Showtime

Title: X
Synopsis: A production team filming a porno finds themselves in danger while staying in a secluded farmhouse in Texas.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Synopsis: Middle-aged laundromat owner Evelyn Wang discovers a multiverse filled with thousands of versions of herself.

Title: Men
Synopsis: A young woman goes on a solo vacation in the English countryside after the death of her ex-husband.

Title: Elizabeth: A Portrait in Parts
Synopsis: A documentary about Queen Elizabeth II.

Title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
Synopsis: A documentary director helps Marcel, a one-inch-tall shell, search for his family.

Title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
Synopsis: A murder transpires during a party between young, rich, and backstabbing friends.

Title: Funny Pages
Synopsis: The coming-of-age story of a teenage cartoonist.

Title: Pearl
Synopsis: A prequel to X, it follows the origins of Pearl and how she became the person she was.

Title: Instinct
Synopsis: A prison therapist becomes obsessed with her charismatic patient, a violent serial rapist on the verge of being paroled.

Title: God's Creatures
Director(s): Saela Davis and Anna Rose Holmer
Synopsis: In a windswept fishing village, a mother lies to protect her son from a serious allegation.

Title: Stars at Noon
Synopsis: A young American journalist stranded in present-day Nicaragua falls for an enigmatic Englishman who seems like her best chance of escape.

Title: Aftersun
Synopsis: A woman reminisces about embarking on a summer vacation to Turkey with her father during her childhood.

Title: Causeway
Synopsis: A US soldier suffers a traumatic brain injury and struggles to adjust to life back home.
Notes: Produced by A24; co-distributed with Apple TV+

Title: The Inspection
Synopsis: At boot camp, Ellis French's sexual orientation makes him the target of near-lethal hazing from a training instructor and a fellow recruit.

Title: White Noise
Synopsis: Dramatizes a contemporary American family's attempts to deal with the mundane conflicts of everyday life while grappling with the universal mysteries of love, death, and the possibility of happiness in an uncertain world.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Netflix

Title: The Eternal Daughter
Synopsis: An artist and her elderly mother confront long-buried secrets when they returned to a former family home, now a hotel haunted by its mysterious past.

Title: The Whale
Synopsis: A 600-pound (272 kg) middle-aged man tries to reconnect with his 17-year-old daughter.

Title: This Place Rules
Synopsis: A documentary about the events leading to the January 6th US Capitol riot.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by HBO

Title: When You Finish Saving the World
Synopsis: A high school student pursues music while living with his formal and uptight mother who runs a shelter for survivors of domestic abuse.

Title: Close
Synopsis: A teenager tries to distance himself from his best friend after their close relationship is commented on.

Title: Sharper
Synopsis: A con artist takes on Manhattan's billionaires.
Notes: Also produced by A24; co-distributed with Apple TV+

Title: Pi
Synopsis: A mathematician discovers a string of numbers connected to religion while trying to predict stock market patterns.
Notes: 25th anniversary re-release; originally distributed by Artisan Entertainment

Title: Showing Up
Synopsis: An artist on the verge of a career-changing exhibition finds inspiration in the chaos of life.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Synopsis: A mild-mannered but paranoid man realizes his greatest fears as embarks on a surrealistic odyssey to get home to his mother's funeral.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Synopsis: A novelist whose long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Past Lives
Synopsis: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Two decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

Title: Earth Mama
Synopsis: Gia, a single mother, tries to navigate life during her latest pregnancy.

Title: The Deepest Breath
Synopsis: A documentary about Alessia Zecchini and her quest to break the diving record.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Netflix

Title: Stephen Curry: Underrated
Synopsis: A documentary on the career of basketball star Stephen Curry from his 2008 NCAA Tournament run with Davidson to the 2021 Golden State Warriors run at another NBA Championship.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Apple TV+

Title: Talk to Me
Synopsis: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

Title: Medusa Deluxe
Synopsis: A murder mystery set in a competitive hairdressing contest.

Title: Stop Making Sense
Synopsis: A re-release of Jonathan Demme’s seminal Talking Heads documentary Stop Making Sense for its 40th anniversary, newly restored in 4K.
Notes: Re-release; originally distributed by Cinecom Pictures and Island Alive

Title: Dicks: The Musical
Synopsis: Two business adversaries who realize they're identical twin brothers decide to switch places to reunite their divorced parents so they all can become an actual family again.

Title: Priscilla
Synopsis: The film follows Priscilla Presley and her complicated romantic relationship with Elvis Presley.

Title: All Dirt Roads Taste of Salt
Synopsis: The film charts the growth, loves, and heartbreaks of a Black woman in Mississippi, from her childhood through her adult years.

Title: Dream Scenario
Synopsis: A schlubby professor becomes an overnight celebrity after appearing in everyone's dream.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Synopsis: The commandant of the Auschwitz concentration camp, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: The Iron Claw
Synopsis: The Von Erich family is a dynasty of wrestlers from the 1960s onwards that had enormous success and popularized the iron claw professional wrestling hold. However, they not only had to battle inside the ring, but fight the "Von Erich curse" outside of it.

Title: Occupied City
Synopsis: A documentary set in present-day Amsterdam that traces where the occupying German Nazi forces committed atrocities against the local Jewish population back in World War II.

Title: My Mercury
Synopsis: A passionate conservationist makes a cruel pact to save endangered seabirds from extinction on an inhospitable island, alone. In the end, it's a victory for the birds, but at what price?
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Amazon Prime Video

Title: Open Wide
Synopsis: John Mew thinks we're all ugly. And modern living is to blame. For decades he's waged a lonely war against orthodontics and that teenage rite of passage - braces.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Netflix

Title: Jerry Lee Lewis: Trouble in Mind
Synopsis: The life and music of legendary early rock and roll pioneer Jerry Lee Lewis from his rise to the top of the billboard charts through his tumultuous fall from grace.
Notes: Produced by A24, distributed by Amazon Prime Video

Title: Problemista
Synopsis: A struggling aspiring toy designer from El Salvador starts working for an erratic art-world outcast in New York City, hoping to stay in the country and realize his dream before his work visa expires.

Title: Love Lies Bleeding
Synopsis: Reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Las Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into the web of Lou’s criminal family.

Title: STEVE! (martin) a documentary in 2 pieces
Synopsis: A 2-part documentary film about the life and career of Steve Martin.
Notes: Produced by A24; distributed by Apple TV+
